data.name: The Mourne's
data.detailed_description:
The Mourne's is my first ever game project,

The game mainly focuses on exploration and puzzle alongside combat encounters placed throughout the open world.
Features the option to play Solo, Local Co-op or online Multiplayer Co-op

I've aimed to keep the game for people who are looking for something simple, relaxing and easy on the eyes so if that sounds appealing at all give it a try, I would appreciate it ^-^

Since this is a solo project updates will take sometime but open to feedback / bugs or whatever you feel and you can submit them through the Discord or my email.

Planning to implement some of the following later down the line
-Expanded Story
-Crafting system (Simple / Advanced)
-In-depth boss fight encounters

Hope you enjoy ^-^
data.about_the_game:
The Mourne's is my first ever game project,

The game mainly focuses on exploration and puzzle alongside combat encounters placed throughout the open world.

I've aimed to keep the game for people who are looking for something simple, relaxing and easy on the eyes so if that sounds appealing at all give it a try, I would appreciate it ^-^

data.short_description: The Mourne's is a work-in-progress relaxing Adventure game with some emphasis on Puzzle Solving and can be done either Solo or with some friends :)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 4 3600
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
